src:
Bikin Laper! Makan Enak Shabu-shabu, Begor, Bakmi, hingga Sate Kambing
04 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Foto: @bikinlapertranstv

Jakarta - Petualangan para jagoan makan mencari kuliner enak terus berlanjut. Kali ini mereka menyantap shabu-shabu, hingga sate kambing yang empuk juicy.Keseruan Ncess Nabati dan Dimas Beck dalam mencari makanan, memang selalu bikin ngiler. Lewat acara Bikin Laper yang tayang di Trans TV setiap hari Senin-Jumat, pukul 18.00-19.00, Ncess dan Dimas dibuat kewalahan dengan berbagai makanan enak.


Foto: @bikinlapertranstv

Baca Juga: Ada Mie Godog, Tom Yam hingga Shabu-shabu Enak yang Bikin Laper Di episode terbaru Bikin Laper yang tayang sore ini, Ncess dan Dimas berkunjung ke wilayah Kelapa Gading, Jakarta Utara, untuk mampir ke restoran Mizayaki. Di sana mereka menyantap makanan sepuasnya, dengan menu andalan yaitu Sumo Meat Tower, atau irisan daging sapi gurih yang dibuat seperti gunung.Selain mencoba aneka daging panggang, di Mizayaki mereka juga mencoba menu shabu-shabu dengan konsep makan sesuka hati hingga perut kenyang dan dijamin bikin laper!Masih di sekitar Kelapa Gading, ada tempat makan bebek goreng yang terkenal, namanya Bebek Ummi. Ncess dan Dimas kompak memesan Bebek Goreng atau begor bumbu hitam, yang jadi menu favorit di sana. Tak ketinggalan, olahan sate bebek yang enak dan juicy empuk, serta sop buntut hangat yang gurih dan mengenyangkan.


Foto: @bikinlapertranstv

Belum puas makan bebek, duo makan yang super heboh ini lanjut mampir ke restoran Bakmi Bintang Gading, yang tak jauh dari Bebek Ummi. Penasaran dengan menu yang ditawarkan, pilihan Ncess dan Dimas jatuh ke Mie Khas Ujung Pandang yang bikin ngiler.


Foto: @bikinlapertranstv

Tak ketinggalan mereka juga mencoba pangsit mie, dan nasi goreng merah yang rasanya juara. Serta ditutup dengan mie gaya kanton yang bikin mereka berdua kekenyangan. Bagaimana ya keseruan mereka berdua ketika menghabiskan makanan-makanan ini?Terakhir, Ncess Nabati mengajak Naomi Zasika untuk jalan-jalan di wilayah Bendungan Hiiir, Jakarta Pusat. Terletak di Jalan Penjernihan I, ada tempat makan sate legendaris yang wajib dicoba. Namanya Pondok Sate Djono Jogya, menawarkan berbagai hidangan sate hingga sop.Ditemani Naomi, Ncess melahap habis sate kambing dan sop sumsum kambing dengan paduan kuah santan yang gurih legit. Rasa gurihnya juga bikin nagih, dan membuat Ncess serta Naomi tak bisa berhenti makan.


Foto: @bikinlapertranstv

Penasaran kan dengan semua makanan enak yang dicicip para jagoan makan ini? Jangan lupa tonton episode terbaru Bikin Laper sore ini, yang tayang di Trans Tv pukul 18.00.Bisa juga kunjungi akun Instagram @Bikinlapertranstv untuk mengetahui, bocoran menu dan restoran hingga makanan-makanan enak yang akan tayang.Baca Juga: Sop Sumsum dan Nasi Kulit yang Nikmatnya Bikin Laper Simak Video "Bikin Laper Edisi Pedas Sambal 'Devil' Hingga Makanan Minang"[Gambas:Video 20detik](sob/odi)
text:
Make me hungry! Eat Tasty Shabu-Shabu, Begor, Bakmi, to Goat Satay
Nov 04 2019, 10:00 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Photo: @bikinlapertranstv

Jakarta - The adventure of the hero to eat looking for delicious culinary continues. This time they ate methamphetamine, until the juicy goat satay was tender. Vegetable Ncess Curry and Dimas Beck in looking for food, it always makes you drool. Through the Make Laper program that airs on Trans TV every Monday-Friday, from 18:00 to 19:00, Ncess and Dimas are overwhelmed with a variety of delicious foods.


Photo: @bikinlapertranstv

Also Read: There are Godog Noodles, Tom Yam to Delicious Shabu-Shabu that Make Laper In the latest episode of Make Laper that aired this afternoon, Ncess and Dimas visited the Kelapa Gading region, North Jakarta, to stop by Mizayaki restaurant. There they ate as much food as they could, with a mainstay menu namely Sumo Meat Tower, or savory beef slices made like a mountain. In addition to trying a variety of grilled meats, at Mizayaki they also tried the shabu-shabu menu with the concept of eating at will until the stomach was full and guaranteed guaranteed making laper! Still around Kelapa Gading, there is a famous fried duck place, called Ummi Duck. Ncess and Dimas compact ordered fried duck or black pepper sauce, which became a favorite menu there. Not to forget, the processed duck satay is delicious and tender juicy, and warm and delicious warm oxtail soup.


Photo: @bikinlapertranstv

Not satisfied with eating duck, this super-excited dining duo continued to stop by the Bakmi Bintang Gading restaurant, which is not far from Duck Ummi. Intrigued by the menu offered, the choice of Ncess and Dimas fell to the Ujung Pandang Noodle that made you drool.


Photo: @bikinlapertranstv

Not to forget they also tried dumpling noodles, and red fried rice that tastes champion. And closed with Cantonese style noodles that make them both stuffed. How about the excitement of the two of them when eating these foods? Finally, Ncess Nabati invited Naomi Zasika to take a walk in the Hiiir Dam area, Central Jakarta. Located on Jalan Penjernihan I, there is a place to eat legendary satay that must be tried. His name is Pondok Sate Djono Jogya, offering a variety of satay dishes to soups. Accompanied by Naomi, Ncess devoured goat satay and goat marrow soup with a mixture of legit tasty coconut milk soup. The savory taste also makes us addicted, and makes Ncess and Naomi unable to stop eating.


Photo: @bikinlapertranstv

Are you curious about all the delicious food that the champs eat? Don't forget to watch the latest episode of Make a Laper this afternoon, which airs on Trans Tv at 18:00. You can also visit the Instagram account @Bikinlapertranstv to find out, leaked menus and restaurants to delicious foods that will be aired. Read Also: Marrow Soup and Skin Rice that The pleasure of making Laper Check out the video "Making Laper Spicy Edition of 'Devil' Sambal To Minang Food" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (sob / odi)
